web.auth.mfa_required.translation: E hiahiatia ana te whakaūnga MFA

web.auth.mfa_verification_required.en: MFA verification required to access your account
web.auth.mfa_verification_required.translation: E hiahiatia ana te whakaūnga MFA hei uru ki tō pūkete

web.auth.security.authentication_failed.en: Authentication failed. Please verify your credentials and try again.
web.auth.security.authentication_failed.translation: I rahua te whakaūnga. Tēnā manatoko i ō taipitopito whakaūnga ka ngana anō.

web.auth.security.rate_limited.en: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
web.auth.security.rate_limited.translation: He maha rawa ngā ngana. Tēnā ngana anō i muri mai.

web.auth.security.session_expired.en: Session expired. Please log in again.
web.auth.security.session_expired.translation: Kua pau te wātū. Tēnā takiuru anō.

web.auth.security.recovery_code_not_foun.en: Recovery code not found. Please verify you entered it correctly.
web.auth.security.recovery_code_not_foun.translation: Kāore i kitea te waehere whakaora. Tēnā manatoko i tō tāurunga.

web.auth.security.recovery_code_used.en: This recovery code has already been used. Each code can only be used once.
web.auth.security.recovery_code_used.translation: Kua whakamahia kē tēnei waehere whakaora. Ka taea te whakamahi kotahi ia waehere.

web.auth.security.network_error.en: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
web.auth.security.network_error.translation: Hapa whatunga. Tēnā tirotiro i tō hononga ka ngana anō.

web.auth.security.internal_error.en: An error occurred. Please try again.
web.auth.security.internal_error.translation: I puta tētahi hapa. Tēnā ngana anō.

web.auth.magicLink.description.en: We'll send you a secure login link
web.auth.magicLink.description.translation: Ka tukuna e mātou he hononga takiuru haumaru ki a koe

web.auth.magicLink.sentTo.en: We sent a login link to {email}
web.auth.magicLink.sentTo.translation: I tuku mātou i tētahi hononga takiuru ki {email}

web.auth.magicLink.linkExpiresIn.en: This link will expire in 15 minutes
web.auth.magicLink.linkExpiresIn.translation: Ka pau tēnei hononga i roto i te 15 meneti

web.auth.magicLink.noPasswordNeeded.en: No password needed — just click the link in your email
web.auth.magicLink.noPasswordNeeded.translation: Kāore e hiahiatia he kupuhipa — pāwhiritia noa te hononga i tō īmēra

web.auth.magicLink.requestFailed.en: Failed to send login link. Please try again.
web.auth.magicLink.requestFailed.translation: I rahua te tuku hononga takiuru. Tēnā ngana anō.

web.auth.magicLink.loginFailed.translation: I rahua te takiuru. Tēnā ngana anō.

web.auth.magicLink.signingYouIn.translation: Kei te takiuru i a koe...

web.auth.magicLink.pleaseWait.en: Please wait while we verify your link
web.auth.magicLink.pleaseWait.translation: Tēnā taihoa i a mātou e whakaū ana i tō hononga

web.auth.webauthn.signIn.en: Sign in with Face ID / Touch ID
web.auth.webauthn.signIn.translation: Takiuru mā te Face ID / Touch ID

web.auth.webauthn.notSupported.en: Biometric authentication is not supported in this browser
web.auth.webauthn.notSupported.translation: Kāore te whakaūnga pūāhua koiora e tautokohia i tēnei pūtirotiro

web.auth.webauthn.requiresModernBrowser.en: Please use a modern browser that supports WebAuthn (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, or Edge)
web.auth.webauthn.requiresModernBrowser.translation: Tēnā whakamahia tētahi pūtirotiro hou-ake e tautoko ana i WebAuthn (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge rānei)

web.auth.webauthn.setupSuccess.translation: Kua whakahohea te takiuru pūāhua koiora

web.auth.webauthn.setupFailed.en: Failed to set up biometric login
web.auth.webauthn.setupFailed.translation: I rahua te whakatū takiuru pūāhua koiora

web.auth.webauthn.authFailed.en: Biometric authentication failed. Please try again.
web.auth.webauthn.authFailed.translation: I rahua te whakaūnga pūāhua koiora. Tēnā ngana anō.

web.auth.webauthn.description.en: Use your fingerprint, face, or security key to sign in
web.auth.webauthn.description.translation: Whakamahia tō maihi-matikara, kanohi, kī haumaru rānei hei takiuru

web.auth.webauthn.supportedMethods.en: Supports Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello, and security keys
web.auth.webauthn.supportedMethods.translation: E tautoko ana i Face ID, Touch ID, Windows Hello, me ngā kī haumaru

web.auth.lockout.attempts_remaining.translation: Whakatūpato: {count} ngā ngana takiuru e toe ana

web.auth.lockout.account_locked.en: Account locked due to too many failed login attempts
web.auth.lockout.account_locked.translation: Kua raka te pūkete nā te maha o ngā ngana takiuru i rahua

web.auth.lockout.locked_until.translation: Kua raka tō pūkete tae noa ki {time}

web.auth.lockout.contact_support.en: Contact support if you need immediate access
web.auth.lockout.contact_support.translation: Whakapā ki te tautoko mēnā e hiahiatia ana te urunga tere

web.auth.lockout.try_password_reset.en: You can reset your password instead
web.auth.lockout.try_password_reset.translation: Ka taea e koe te tautuhi anō i tō kupuhipa

web.auth.sessions.remove_all.translation: Takiputa i Ngā Wātū Kē Atu Katoa

web.auth.sessions.confirm_remove.en: Are you sure you want to remove this session?
web.auth.sessions.confirm_remove.translation: E tino hiahia ana koe ki te tango i tēnei wātū?

web.auth.sessions.confirm_remove_all.en: This will log you out from all other devices. Are you sure?
web.auth.sessions.confirm_remove_all.translation: Ka takiputa tēnei i a koe mai i ngā pūrere kē atu katoa. E tino hiahia ana koe?

web.auth.sessions.removed_all_success.en: All other sessions have been logged out
web.auth.sessions.removed_all_success.translation: Kua takiputa ngā wātū kē atu katoa

web.auth.mfa.setup_description.en: Add an extra layer of security to your account
web.auth.mfa.setup_description.translation: Tāpiri i tētahi papa haumaru tāpiri ki tō pūkete

web.auth.mfa.scan_qr.en: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
web.auth.mfa.scan_qr.translation: Kamera i tēnei waehere QR ki tō taupānga whakaū

web.auth.mfa.manual_entry.translation: Tāuru rānei i tēnei waehere ā-ringa

web.auth.mfa.verify_code.en: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
web.auth.mfa.verify_code.translation: Tāuru i te waehere 6-mati mai i tō taupānga

web.auth.mfa.code_required.translation: E hiahiatia ana te waehere whakaū

web.auth.mfa.invalid_code.en: Invalid code. Codes expire every 30 seconds. Try the latest code from your authenticator app.
web.auth.mfa.invalid_code.translation: Waehere muhu. Ka pau ngā waehere ia 30 hēkona. Whakamātau i te waehere hou rawa atu mai i tō taupānga whakaū.

web.auth.mfa.require_password.translation: Tāuru tō kupuhipa hei monoki i te 2FA

web.auth.mfa.password_reason.en: Confirm your identity to modify two-factor authentication settings
web.auth.mfa.password_reason.translation: Whakaū i tō tuakiri hei whakarerekē i ngā tautuhinga whakaūnga pūāhua-rua

web.auth.mfa.cancel.en: Cancel and return to sign in
web.auth.mfa.cancel.translation: Whakakore me te hoki ki te takiuru

web.auth.mfa.loading_status.translation: Kei te uta i te tūnga MFA...

web.auth.mfa.protected_description.en: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication
web.auth.mfa.protected_description.translation: Kua tiakina tō pūkete ki te whakaūnga pūāhua-rua

web.auth.mfa.enable_description.en: Protect your account with an additional layer of security
web.auth.mfa.enable_description.translation: Tiaki i tō pūkete ki tētahi papa haumaru tāpiri

web.auth.mfa.benefit_unauthorized.en: Prevent unauthorized access even if your password is compromised
web.auth.mfa.benefit_unauthorized.translation: Ārai i te urunga kore mana ahakoa he hē tō kupuhipa

web.auth.mfa.benefit_apps.en: Works with Google Authenticator, Authy, and other TOTP apps
web.auth.mfa.benefit_apps.translation: Ka mahi tahi me Google Authenticator, Authy, me ētahi atu taupānga TOTP

web.auth.mfa.benefit_recovery.en: Backup recovery codes for emergency access
web.auth.mfa.benefit_recovery.translation: Ngā waehere whakaora taraki mō te urunga ohotata

web.auth.mfa.supported_apps.en: Use Google Authenticator, Authy, or any TOTP app
web.auth.mfa.supported_apps.translation: Whakamahi i Google Authenticator, Authy, tētahi taupānga TOTP rānei

web.auth.mfa.enter_code_description.en: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
web.auth.mfa.enter_code_description.translation: Tāuru i te waehere 6-mati mai i tō taupānga whakaū

web.auth.mfa.enter_recovery_code.en: Enter one of your recovery codes
web.auth.mfa.enter_recovery_code.translation: Tāuru tētahi o ō waehere whakaora

web.auth.mfa.recovery_code_mode_active.translation: Kei te hohe te aratau waehere whakaora

web.auth.mfa.otp_mode_active.translation: Kei te hohe te aratau waehere whakaū

web.auth.mfa.enter_all_digits.en: Please enter all 6 digits to continue
web.auth.mfa.enter_all_digits.translation: Tēnā tāuru i ngā mati 6 katoa kia haere tonu

web.auth.recovery_codes.description.en: Save these codes in a safe place. Each can be used once if you lose access to your authenticator.
web.auth.recovery_codes.description.translation: Tiaki i ēnei waehere ki tētahi wāhi haumaru. Ka taea te whakamahi kotahi ia waehere mēnā ka ngaro tō urunga ki tō taupānga whakaū.

web.auth.recovery_codes.warning.en: These codes will only be shown once
web.auth.recovery_codes.warning.translation: Ka whakaatuhia ēnei waehere kotahi anake

web.auth.recovery_codes.save_required.en: You must download or copy your recovery codes before completing setup.
web.auth.recovery_codes.save_required.translation: Me tikiake, tārua rānei i ō waehere whakaora i mua i te whakaoti whakatūnga.

web.auth.recovery_codes.generate_new_war.en: This will invalidate all existing recovery codes
web.auth.recovery_codes.generate_new_war.translation: Ka whakakorehia e tēnei ngā waehere whakaora tīari katoa

web.auth.recovery_codes.copied.translation: Kua tāruatia ngā waehere ki te papatopenga

web.auth.recovery_codes.copy_failed.en: Failed to copy codes to clipboard
web.auth.recovery_codes.copy_failed.translation: I rahua te tārua i ngā waehere ki te papatopenga

web.auth.recovery_codes.remaining.translation: {count} ngā waehere whakaora e toe ana

web.auth.recovery_codes.usage_hint.en: Each code can only be used once. Regenerate codes if you're running low.
web.auth.recovery_codes.usage_hint.translation: Ka taea te whakamahi kotahi ia waehere. Hangaia anō ngā waehere mēnā kei te iti haere.

web.auth.recovery_codes.none_remaining.translation: Kāore he waehere whakaora e toe ana

web.auth.recovery_codes.generate_success.en: New recovery codes have been generated
web.auth.recovery_codes.generate_success.translation: Kua hangaia ngā waehere whakaora hou
